sourceDesc.bibl: Statement on International Birth Control, The Bakersfield Californian, Jul 22, 1937, p. 11

docBody.head: World Birth Control Favored by Sanger

p.q: Margaret Sanger today set world-wide birth control as her next goal. The noted birth control advocate, en route to China at the call of birth control organizations there, said:

docBody.p: "Now that the American legal barriers are out of the way and medical opinion has been established world-wide birth control is the next step."
